name: Movie Capers And Heists Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Topkapi' involved an intricate 'break-in' to steal some valuables. Peter Ustinov and Maximillian Schell were in the cast; who was the female would-be thief?
'The Asphalt Jungle' featured Marilyn Monroe in an early (small) role. Who was the planning mastermind behind the crime?
questions.explanation:
Sam Jaffe.

	With Sterling Hayden and Jean Hagen

questions.text: 'The Sting' was an enormously entertaining 'con' movie. Who was the victim that got 'stung'?
questions.explanation:
Robert Shaw.

	Newman and Redford, of course. Gould was part of the cast.

questions.text: 'High Sierra' featured Humphrey Bogart as an ex-con attempting one more job. Who played his 'girl friend'?
questions.explanation:
Ida Lupino.

	Good movie. Tough Bogart

questions.text: Steve McQueen and Ali MacGraw starred in 'The Getaway'. Where did they 'get away' to?
'Double Indemnity' involves a plot by Fred MacMurray and Barbara Stanwyck to collect some life insurance money. Who is the insurance investigator that causes concerns for MacMurray?
questions.explanation:
Edward G. Robinson

	Edward G - not a tough guy, this time

questions.text: In 'Sorry, Wrong Number', Burt Lancaster tries to get out from under Barbara Stanwyck's thumb by tampering with her father's business. Who plays the father?
questions.explanation:
Ed Begley.

	Corey was her psychiatrist

questions.text: 'Assault on a Queen' involved an attempted robbery of an ocean liner. Who played the woman involved?
questions.explanation:
Virna Lisi.

	Beautiful. With Frank Sinatra and Tony Franciosa

questions.text: 'Malice' involves an attempted fraud. Who is the perpetrator?
questions.explanation:
Alec Baldwin.

	In the context of a medical malpractice case

questions.text: Which James Bond movie involved a plot to capture Fort Knox?
questions.explanation:
Goldfinger.

	One of the better Bond movies
